TopicTitle: Let the landing gear have the steering function

Articles.Content:
In real life, landing gear have the steering function, plane can easily make a turn.

But in KSP, landing gear can't steering .When we make a turn while taxi the plane ,we have to use the vertical flaps to make a big curve turn.

If the landing gear can steer, it will be awesome
It's already been suggested in this list.

It indeed is, that means for now we can only wait for the developers to take a decision on this topic. Feel free to add anything in the thread on this subject, it's still recent

That being said, thread closed.
